text: Ara yakhana tadera madhyera ekati dala balale -- ''kena tomara se'i lokadera upadesa diccha allah yadera dhbansa karate yacchena athaba kathora sastite sasti dite yacchena’’? Tamra balalena -- ''tomadera prabhura kache dosamukta habara jan'ya, ara yate tara dharmaparayanata abalanbana kare.’’
